reviews.review: There are enough good reviews of this game, so i'll keep this review short and sweet (kinda like the game itself). This is a GREAT GAME! You've probably already heard that, as had I, but you need to play it for yourself. The humor is nice, the puzzles are creative, the controls are great, and the game doesn't overstay it's welcome. It's an overall great game! I would definitely reccomend this game to anyone!

Before playing it, I had been quite cynical towards Valves Portal. I felt the reviews were simply too good. After finally getting around to playing it, I can safely say that it is as good as many believe it to be! Tight controls, innovative gameplay, clever and often hilarious dialogue and an excellent villain, this game was a joy to play. Yes it is very short, but that works to its advantage. Valve created a game that has been trimmed of all fat, leaving a delicious meaty, steak of meat. Plus, there's cake!
Muito bom, pelo pouco tempo jogado e muito bom o jogo recomendo.
I Love this game....  The cake is a lie!!!
just great
Un jeu impressionant, particulièrement bien pensé.
Very fun puzzle game.

Wow...

Just a brilliant game that is very well paced and has engaging and challenging puzzles. From the first eerie chamber to the amazing ending it is truly a masterpiece.

But then, I don't need to tell you this, you've probably already played through it at least twice and told me how the cake is a lie already. 
Still, 
Just in case someone hasn't played this game: How have you not?
i LOVE this game the ending is SO grate thank you for making this game.......its not a game it is a MASTERPEACE!!!!!!!!

Easily one of my favorite games. Even though I've won it many times now, I still go back to play again.

Portal has been met with fantastic reviews, and I adore the second one, but I found this one to be quite dull. So far, there is no story, or explanation as to why you are loked up in a prison-type place and forced to do puzzles. The loading at random times takes forever, and sometimes cuts through the dialog. I wish I could say I reccomend this game, but I can't. If the game improves by the time I finish, then I shall not only reccomend it, but write a new review stating how wrong I was, and delete this review.
This is one of the best games I've ever played. Its a first person puzzle game that includes a silent protagonist, a suspicous AI construct, a portal gun, and a quest for science.

I can't believe it took me until now to play this game. One of the best games I ever bought. Going to buy Portal 2 soon, when it gets on sale. :P

Portal is an excellent game. Very challenging, forces the player to think carefully about your next steps in order to solve the puzzle you are confronted with. Portal throws increasingly difficult scenarios at you which keeps the gameplay interesting. Unfortunately Portal is very short, once the end level was completed it left me wanting more. That is the mark of an entertaining game though. There are quite a bit of third party maps available for download which will extend the Portal experience and the Bonus Maps feature makes the original levels more difficult once you complete the game.
The Prequel to one of the best games of all time. 'Nuff said.
Muy muy entretenido, pero se hace muy corto, aparte que lo es,GLaDOS es genial
Классная игрушка всю прошел советую по играть

One of the easiest recommendations in the world to give.  Assuming that whoever you recommend it to can deal with the perspective shifts and whatnot without getting motion sick, this game is pretty much perfect.  The fanbase is sometimes frustratingly overbearing, but that has nothing to do with the game itself.

If you don't already own it... wait, why don't you own it? Give Valve your money! Not like they need it but damn do they deserve it!

総合評価　７．５／１０

良い所
　パズルの出来。
　独特なゲームメカニック。

悪い所
　無理矢理なアクション要素。
　一人称視点によるポジションやタイミングの取り辛さ。

興味があるなら本作はボリュームが少ないのでセールの時にPORTAL２とのセットを買おう。
（内容を知っていれば２時間ほどでクリアーできてしまうのが本作）

日本語は字幕のみ対応。

Portal è una gemma di dark humor assolutamente imperdibile; un puzzle game che vi farà contorcere dalla disperazione di sapere come superare l'ennesima camera test e di scoprire quale sorte sia capitata agli scienziati dei laboratori Aperture...
L'utilizzo della pistola spara-portali vi spingerà a premere a casaccio i tasti del mouse solo per costruire effetti loop infiniti che vi faranno girare la testa e vi sveleranno involontariamente la soluzione di alcuni grattacapi belli tosti.
Consigliatissimo a chiunque non abbia ancora giocato a questo capolavoro: la durata non è proibitiva ai casual gamers e la storia, seppur breve, regala emozioni intense nella loro rapidità!

P.S. La torta è buonissima! :)
Jamas me habia reido tanto viendo y escuchando los creditos finales de un juego. Obra maestra atemporal ^^

Jugué primero a Portal 2, pensé que la primera parte me iba a dejar con sabor a poco, pero todo lo contrario es un juego excelente con la misma dinámica. Una saga imprescindible. El único lunar: la duración de la historia principal.

9/10
Love this game. The only game other than Journey where the goal is not to shoot and kill everything but still amazing story line and in depth characters.

This game blew my mind the first time I played it. The whole idea of portals took some time for my brain to comprehend and adjust to. Once adjusted I had one of the most enjoyable, although short, experiences in video games in my life. A true gamer's game that put a smile on my face from start to finish. It will, without a doubt, go down in the history books as one of the most important video games ever made. On a more superficial note, it is an extremely smooth and well polished game typical of Valve. An obvious must-have in my book, or atleast a must-experience game.
One of the best games I have ever played! Great story line etc. everything just works with this game. A must buy, trust me you'll be playing it non-stop once you buy it :)

У вас нет оружия и нет врагов. Шутка, враги есть всегда, а вот оружия действительно нет.
Думаете добежать из точки «А» в точку «Б» такое простое занятие?
Добро пожаловать в Лабораторию исследования природы порталов, Челл!
Импульс, функция массы и скорости, сохраняется между порталами. Говоря языком дилетанта — что быстро влетает, то быстро и вылетает.
Бери свое переносное устройство создания порталов и пройди все испытания, но помни «The cake is a lie»
This game is amazing and I would defanally go for this one before portal 2.
One of the funniest games you'll ever play. Oh, and it has some puzzles too.

After seeing the trailer i much anticipated this game's release! Not only was i completely satisfied with the gameplay, i was surprised constantly by the challenges.

It was everything i expected and more.

Btw, the ending has a GREAT SONG!!

Freunde haben mir vor einigen Wochen Portal 2 gezeigt, was ich so gut fand, dass ich auch seinen Vorgänger testen wollte. Und ich muss sagen, es gefällt mir bisher super gut :) Ein lustiges Denkspiel mit viel Humor (auch wenn die Tante im Hintergrund manchmal etwas zu viel sagt). Zu Beginn noch Recht leicht, haben es die späteren Aufgaben durchaus in sich. Dafür, dass nur so wenige Aktionen - Laufen, Dinge hochheben/auslösen, zwei Portale erschaffen - gibt, ist die Kombination, die sich daraus ergibt, echt vielseitig. Ein gelungenes Spiel für Zwischendurch oder auch für einen ganzen Tag ;)
Определенно знаковая игра
este juego me parecio exelente, sus niveles, su ''extraño'' humor, en general bueno, lo unico que puedo descir es que me parecio algo corto, pero vamos!!, es rejugable una y mil veces :D

Portal. This is a game you don't forget easily. I'd played it on Xbox version, and I tried PC Version only as source stuff for garry's mod, storage cubes and all. But the story is so playable I ended up doing it again anyway, as it's just so much fun! If you're looking for a unique challenge, with a nice story mixed in, and some very wierd background stories, Portal IS the game for you.

To put it simple, not only one of the best puzzle games ever made, but also one of the best games created. It's so well done on everything. The puzzles are challenging and satisfying once beaten, the portal gun is fun to use, the music was great when it appeared, it has some of the best pacing in gaming and while limited, exploring the facility of Aperture Science is very interesting and gives an omnious atmoshere making you wonder what the hell is happening, only enhanced by the mysterious schribbles and grafittis on the walls. Glados is one of the most interesting, funny and creepy antagonist (atleast on this first game) and I also found Chell to be a pretty nice example of a mime hero.

To also expand on the pacing, the game is very short, but at the same time it never drags, making for an experience that is satisfying in the long-run.

This game is among my Top 5 games of all-time and it's also my absolute favorite PC game. It's obviously the best way to start into the small Portal universe and makes you prepared for its sequel, and even if you started with Portal 2, this is still a must buy.

Compelling story, excellent gameplay, fun and thrilling puzzles yet so much more.

[b]10/10 - Best of its kind[/b]

Sempre tive curiosidade de jogar Portal, mas nunca havia de fato parado para faze-lo. Que desperdício. É, simplesmente, um dos melhores jogos que já tive o prazer de jogar. Simples, desafiador na medida certa, com uma história insanamente perturbadora e interessante, que jogo! Não consegui para de jogar do momento que instalei até terminar a última fase e (achar) que pus fim à uma das maiores vilãs da história dos games.

Ah, os Portais. Terminei o jogo e ainda acho que os explorei pouco. Certamente é possível fazer coisas bem mais interessantes com eles, certamente não explorei o tanto que poderia. Uma ideia simples aplicada de forma incrível, isto é Portal. Recomendo fortemente.

Gutes Spiel leider etwas kurz. Die Geschichte hat nur einige Maggen, man weiß nicht wirklich, was genau man hier spielt oder wie man in dieses Gebäude überhaupt gelangt. Die einzelnen Hallen muss man mit gutem Denken durchqueren und sind eigentlich auch ziemlich leicht zu lösen. Die Zeit zwischen der letzten Halle und dem Endgegner verläuft meiner Meinung nach etwas zu langwierig. Aber im Großen und Ganzen ein tolles Spiel. Nur lasst die Finger davon , wenn ihr gelegntlich leichte Schwindelanfälle habt :)

Kısa zamanda kalbimi çalmayı başardı kerata. :) Günümüz oyunlarından çok farklı bir yapıya sahip. Özellikle "Portal - Still Alive" İsimli oyun müziğinin sözleri çok enteresan. (Oyunun sonunda çalacaktır) Büyük, Küçük herkesin oynayabileceği mükemmel bir oyun. Oyunun ana senaryosunu 3 saatlik bir zaman dilimine tıksalarda Bonus Map'ler ve Challenge'lar oyunun oynanabilirliğini arttırıyor. Oyunda ne yaparsanız yapın Hoparlör'den sesi çıkan Kadına asla güvenmeyin. Eğer zeka oyunlarını seviyorsanız, Bu oyunu aldığınıza pişman olmayacaksınız..

Portal — настоящий шедевр. Самая смешная, оригинальная, интересная и стабильная игра за последнее время. И, пожалуй, единственная игра, в которой при убийстве финального босса хочется смеяться и плакать одновременно.
经典游戏啦，无需多说。

If you haven't played this game then where have you been? This game has one of the best stories out there. You wake up in a cell, with a toilet, a mug and a strange blue portal on the wall. As you venture through the game you find the blue section of the portal gun, which allows to place the blue portal on walls. As you venture further, you come across the orange section of the portal gun. Now you have the ability to place both blue and orange portals. You use these portals to solve puzzling test chambers, [spoiler] and eventually fight your way to the boss at the end of the game. [/spoiler] Overall, this game is one of the best experiences out there, and you will be kept busy with the quite challenging puzzles as you progress further into the game. 
4.5/5
Great game if you like puzzles and 1 person games. Glados makes the game really fun too.
